Interface TaskRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CustomGenericFilter<TaskWithPaginationAndFilterView>, CustomTaskRepository, org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveCrudRepository<Task,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.ReactiveMongoRepository<Task,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.ReactiveQueryByExampleExecutor<Task>, org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveSortingRepository<Task,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Task,String>
public interface TaskRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.ReactiveMongoRepository<Task,String>, CustomGenericFilter<TaskWithPaginationAndFilterView>, CustomTaskRepository
Repository interface for Task entities.

Extends ReactiveMongoRepository for standard CRUD operations and CustomTaskRepository for custom queries and updates.
